definitions.definition: A line or mark made by folding or doubling any pliable substance; hence, a similar mark, however produced.
definitions.example: His pants had a nice sharp crease.

definitions.definition: One of the white lines drawn on the pitch to show different areas of play; especially the popping crease, but also the bowling crease and the return crease.
The circle around the goal, where no offensive players can go.
The goal crease; an area in front of each goal.
A crack.
An Indonesian or Malay dagger with a wavy, or rigid serpentine blade.
A Moro sword with an asymmetrical blade.
To make a crease in; to wrinkle.
To undergo creasing; to form wrinkles.
To lightly bloody; to graze.
definitions.example: The bullet just creased his shoulder.

definitions.definition: To stab with a kris.
(reciprocal pronoun) To one another; one to the other; signifies that a verb applies to two or more entities both as subjects and as direct objects:
definitions.example: Jack and Robert loved each other.

definitions.definition: A first principle or element.
First, earliest or original
Characteristic of the earliest stage of the development of an organism, or relating to a primordium

definitions.definition: Primeval
A nurse.
To feed and cause to grow; to supply with matter which increases bulk or supplies waste, and promotes health; to furnish with nutriment.
To support; to maintain.

To educate; to instruct; to bring up; to nurture; to promote the growth of in attainments.
To promote growth; to furnish nutriment.
To gain nourishment.
The branch of mathematics dealing with spatial relationships.

To raise something or someone to a higher physical, social, moral, intellectual, spiritual or emotional level.

A cluster of skin cells that respond to pain
A kind of finite-state machine whose binary output indicates whether or not a received input was accepted.
A requirement which must be satisfied before taking a course of action.
definitions.example: A marriage licence is a precondition for a wedding.

definitions.definition: To condition in advance
A cotton fabric made from dyed and white yarn woven in checks
Any of the indica subspecies of the rice Oryza sativa, which (unlike the japonica or sinica subspecies) are non-sticky and long-grained.
Marijuana of the species Cannabis indica.

The percussion section of an orchestra or band, the battery; marching instruments in a drumline, as opposed to the pit.
A fine film or strand as of cobwebs, floating in the air or caught on bushes, etc.
A soft, sheer fabric.
Anything delicate, light and flimsy.
Tenuous, light, filmy or delicate.
One who teases or pokes fun.

An economic theory that increased consumption is beneficial to a nation's economy in the long run.

The act of mowing (a garden, grass etc.)

A scornful grimace; a wry face.
A stack of hay, corn, beans or a barn for the storage of hay, corn, beans.
The place in a barn where hay or grain in the sheaf is stowed.
A gull, seagull.
A prison, or other place of confinement.

definitions.definition: The condition of being impure; because of contamination, pollution, adulteration or insufficient purification.

definitions.definition: A component or additive that renders something else impure.
definitions.example: The impurities in the iron ore made extraction of the iron very difficult.

definitions.definition: To contribute or acquire capital (money or other resources) for.
definitions.example: Some states require proof that a new venture is properly capitalized before the state will issue a certificate of incorporation.

definitions.definition: To convert into capital, i.e., to get cash or similar immediately fungible resources for some less fungible property or source of future income.
definitions.example: If we obtain a loan using the business as collateral, the effect will be to capitalize our next ten years of income, giving us cash today that we can use to buy out our competitor.

definitions.definition: To treat as capital, not as an expense.
To profit or to obtain an advantage.
definitions.example: The home team took several shots on goal but was unable to capitalize until late in the game.

definitions.definition: (followed by on) To seize, as an opportunity; to obtain a benefit; to invest on something profitable.
definitions.example: The home team appeared to have the advantage throughout the game, and finally capitalized on their opponents' weakness with just two minutes remaining, scoring several points in quick succession.

definitions.example: Ancient Roman amphitheatres were mostly oval or circular in plan, with seating tiers that surrounded the central performance area, like a modern open-air stadium.

To hurry.

Lacking in interest or variety.
Of or pertaining to an idealist or to idealism.
Suitable for everyday use.
Mundane or commonplace.

Any of the days of a week on which work is done. The five workdays in many countries are usually Monday to Friday (and are defined as such in official and legal usage even though many people work on weekends).
definitions.example: It will take five workdays to process your application.

definitions.definition: That part of a day in which work is done.
definitions.example: My workday is 8 hours.

definitions.definition: A transducer that converts electric signals into sound and is held near the ear, especially as part of a telephone; an earpiece or headphone.
The use of text, data, graphics, audio and video as elements of an extended hypertext system in which all elements are linked so that the user can move among them at will
A short sword with a curved blade, and a convex edge; once used by sailors when boarding an enemy ship.
A similarly shaped tool; a machete.
To cut back (vegetation) with a cutlass.
A hex; an evil spell.
A person or thing supposed to bring bad luck.
To cast a spell on.
To bring bad luck to.
To cause something to happen by mentioning it, usually sarcastically.
Used after the same response is said by two people simultaneously.
The inability to read and write.

definitions.definition: The portion of a population unable to read and write, generally given as a percentage.
A word, phrase or grammatical turn thought to be characteristic of an illiterate person.
(by extension) Unlearnedness; the state of being ignorant or unlettered.
Short for rigor mortis.
Severity or strictness.
Harshness, as of climate.
A trembling or shivering response.
Character of being unyielding or inflexible.
Shrewd questioning.
Higher level of difficulty.
A substance or agent that can cause cancer.
A lean breed of dog used in hunting and racing.
A highball cocktail of vodka and grapefruit juice.
A swift steamer, especially an ocean steamer.
The person or organization to which something, such as a letter or message, is addressed or sent, for whom the item is intended.
The process of amalgamating; a mixture, merger or consolidation.
The result of amalgamating; a mixture or alloy.
The intermarriage and interbreeding of different ethnicities or races.
One who relays confidential information to someone, especially to the police; an informer.

A native speaker who acts as a linguistic reference for a language being studied. The informant demonstrates native pronunciation, provides grammaticality judgments regarding linguistic well-formedness, and may also explain cultural references and other important contextual information.
A sudden, nonrhythmic motor movement or vocalization.
(by extension) Something that is done or produced habitually or characteristically.
(abbreviation) ticket
Excess or superiority of weight, influence, or power, etc.; an outweighing.
The excess of weight of that part of a cannon behind the trunnions over that in front of them.
The greater portion of the weight.
The majority.
Showing cowardice; lacking in courage; weakly fearful.
In the manner of a coward, cowardlily.
To place a harness on something; to tie up or restrain.

definitions.definition: To capture, control or put to use.

definitions.definition: To equip with armour.
The materials used to harness an animal.
Intended to impress others; ostentatious.

definitions.definition: Marked by an unwarranted claim to importance or distinction.

definitions.definition: Any of various substances designed to extend any of several properties of a material.

Any substance added to food to bulk it out, with a higher protein content than a filler.

definitions.definition: A runner, or quick-draw. (from sense #2)
A phrase that extends an expression to include further members of a set, e.g. "and stuff", "or something".
To command, rule over; to possess or own.
To control, to guide or manage.
To handle with skill and ease, especially a weapon or tool.
To exercise (authority or influence) effectively.
Enthusiasm; enjoyment, vigor.

A girl or an unmarried young woman.
A female virgin.

definitions.definition: A man with no experience of sex, especially because of deliberate abstention.
A maidservant.
A clothes maiden.
An unmarried woman, especially an older woman.
A racehorse without any victory, i.e. one having a "virgin record".
A horse race in which all starters are maidens.

A maiden over.
A machine for washing linen.
Of, relating to, or resembling a messiah or the Messiah.
Of, relating to, or resembling messianism.
A person with a broad general knowledge, especially one with more than superficial knowledge in several areas and the ability to combine ideas from diverse fields.
A general practitioner.
Species which can thrive in a wide variety of environmental conditions.
In a humble manner.
The art of preparing and eating good food.
The study of the relationship between food and culture.
A small round fruit of a dark blue or red color of several plants in the related genera Vaccinium and Gaylussacia.
A shrub growing this fruit.
A small amount, as in the phrase huckleberry above a persimmon.
A person of little consequence.
The person one is looking for; the right person for the job.

Language as a system rather than language in use, including the formal rules, structures, and limitations of language.
An inadequate person.
Not worthy; lacking value or merit; worthless.

Marked by expectation.

definitions.definition: Pregnant.

definitions.definition: Awaiting the effects of nature, with little active treatment.
A sword having a blade made of a powerful beam of light.
A small tube inserted into a body cavity to administer a drug, create an opening, distend a passageway, or remove fluid.

The work of the joiner.
A polygon with eight sides and eight angles.
Often in the form Octagon: the arena for mixed martial arts.
A statement in assembly language that defines a symbol having a particular value.
To consider equal or equivalent.
To set as equal.
A plant of the obsolete genus Azalea.
The fulfillment of something worked for.

definitions.definition: The enjoyment derived from a possession.
The condition of bearing fruit.
A biscuit consisting mostly of nuts and preserved fruit, usually coated with chocolate on one side.
A kind of durable silk.
A kind of pudding or tart or meat pie.
Cooked or served with spinach.

The vulva.
A yellow stain on a shirt armpit caused by sweat or deodorant.
To fold or cause to buckle in half, similar to the way a taco is folded.
To live; to reside.
To linger (on) a particular thought, idea etc.; to remain fixated (on).
To be in a given state.

definitions.definition: A salt of any halogen acid.
To make subservient; to strip one of freedom; enthrall.

definitions.definition: Any substance produced by, or taking part in, a metabolic reaction.
Class; kind.
(grammar) A division of nouns and pronouns (and sometimes of other parts of speech) into masculine or feminine, and sometimes other categories like neuter or common, and animate or inanimate.
(now sometimes proscribed) Sex (a category such as "male" or "female" into which sexually-reproducing organisms are divided on the basis of their reproductive roles in their species).

definitions.definition: Identification as a man, a woman or something else, and association with a (social) role or set of behavioral and cultural traits, clothing, etc; a category to which a person belongs on this basis. (Compare gender role, gender identity.)

(hardware) The quality which distinguishes connectors, which may be male (fitting into another connector) and female (having another connector fit into it), or genderless/androgynous (capable of fitting together with another connector of the same type).
Sound uttered by the mouth, especially by human beings in speech or song; sound thus uttered considered as possessing some special quality or character

definitions.definition: Sound made through vibration of the vocal cords; sonant, or intonated, utterance; tone; — distinguished from mere breath sound as heard in whispering and voiceless consonants.

Command; precept.

definitions.definition: In harmony, an independent vocal or instrumental part in a piece of composition.

To slacken.
To mitigate; to reduce the strength of.

Lasting for a short period of time.

Not similar; unalike; different

definitions.definition: A large division of possibly related languages, or a major language family which is not subordinate to another.

A night out with one's friends.

Anything that is beyond understanding.

A small sticker affixed to a vehicle windscreen to indicate that tolls have been paid.

Healthy.

definitions.example: 1998: Mr MI Pennington, Can the Players be Trusted? on rec.games.frp.live-action http//groups.google.co.uk/group/rec.games.frp.live-action/browse_thread/thread/13742e3a1c45df34/f9662af9a11a42d3?lnk=st&q=flange+roleplay&rnum=1#f9662af9a11a42d3 [The] enduring problem with the Gathering is that [players] can't affect anything that happens ... whatever they do, the LT just flange it back to the original plot line.

definitions.definition: A vulva.
The collective noun for a group of baboons.
definitions.example: 1980s (first use), Rowan Atkinson - Not the Nine O'clock News

definitions.definition: The electronic sound distortion produced by a flanger.
One who engages in the sport of bowling.
The player currently bowling.
A player selected mainly for his bowling ability.
(1800s) The pitcher.
A bowler hat; a round black hat formerly popular among British businessmen.
Of a heavenly body, to be at the highest point, reach its greatest altitude.
To reach the (physical) summit, highest point, peak etc.
To reach a climax; to come to the decisive point (especially as an end or conclusion).
definitions.example: The class will culminate with a rigorous examination.

definitions.definition: To finalize, bring to a conclusion, form the climax of.
The act of stealing property.
A small board with keys primarily used for tactile input into a machine.
definitions.example: Many laptop computers have special function keys which turn part of the alphabetical keyboard into a numeric keypad.

definitions.definition: A bell tower (now especially when freestanding), often associated with a church or other public building, especially in Italy.
definitions.example: The Leaning Tower of Pisa is a campanile.
